name: VRWeapons
description:
A VR toolkit, VRWeapons was on the Unity3D Asset Store from 2015-2018. VRWeapons is a set of tools for use with SteamVR, Oculus, and OpenXR that allow a developer to easily build realistic guns for use in their VR game.

(NOTE: The VRWeapons demo was developed specifically for the HTC Vive, though it should work on newer hardware. Thus, the HTC Vive is recommended for this demo, but some type of VR headset is required.)
